column4: can anyone tell me how to completely uninstall and remove ndiswrapper,,, and envy while i'm at it?
sudo aptitude remove --purge ndiswrapper-common ndiswrapper-modules-1.9
for envy, you might need to reinstall
Thank you,, i did try sudo aptitude remove --purge ndiswrapper-common ndiswrapper-modules-1.9 but I'm not convinced is gone
you might need to reboot just to be sure
